name: SPCTornadoSevereThunderstormWatchesupdates
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This is an RSS feed that is supported by The National Weather Service and all information is updated by them. This is not meant to be a means of getting severe weather alerts in your area. This is just one way to be able to check when you know severe weather is possible in your area.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
